name: Smart Notes (Free Notion Template)
description: Taking notes isn't just for students.“The most important advantage of writing is that it helps us confront ourselves when we do not understand something as well as we would like to believe.” — Sönke Ahrens, How to Take Smart NotesSmart Notes helps you take notes to collect knowledge and keep it at the front of your mind. Whether you're a university student, a knowledge worker, or a life-long learner, Smart Notes will help you on your journey. A simple spaced repetition system is built into Smart
features: Even though this template is free, I would appreciate it if you would send the Gumroad link to anyone you would like to share.
